app.title: DO I LIVE PRECARIOUSLY? BINGO
app.subtitle: Fill in and find out! You might win a consolation prize, but also our sympathy and support for sure!
app.joinText: BINGO! You are living precariously. And many others with you. This upsets us too! Become a member of the Bond Precaire Woonvormen
app.logoAlt: BPW Amsterdam Logo - Click to visit website
app.joinImageAlt: Become a Member of BPW - Click to join

zekerheid.1: I have a temporary housing contract (again)
zekerheid.2: I live in temporary places for months/years already (no solid place is available)
zekerheid.4: I have to move in a few days/weeks/months but can't find anything else
zekerheid.5: There is no stable living situation here
zekerheid.6: I am not at home in my house

betaalbaarheid.7: I'm in debt(s) due to having to live too expensively
betaalbaarheid.8: My room is far too expensive (more than 40% of my income)
betaalbaarheid.9: I sometimes can't pay my rent
betaalbaarheid.10: I can't apply for housing allowance
betaalbaarheid.11: My landlord can't be reached or doesn't respond

tijdelijkheid.13: I live anti-squat, eviction is uncertain
tijdelijkheid.14: My life consists of 3 major topics: studying, working and moving house
tijdelijkheid.16: I live with friends/family out of necessity
tijdelijkheid.17: The housing situation has a (big) impact on my life
tijdelijkheid.18: I am the only one in this situation

beschikbaarheid.19: I hate those never-ending waiting lists
beschikbaarheid.20: I don't believe in this housing system
beschikbaarheid.21: I've been registered for social housing for years
beschikbaarheid.22: I've placed more than 100 applications without success
beschikbaarheid.23: I constantly have to lower my requirements
beschikbaarheid.24: I've been searching for affordable housing for months/years
